946841532413464580.text: I KNEW he was going to say this. The effects are extreme, abnormal weather on both ends. Also doesn’t cancel out the countless other obvious signs of global warming occurring around the globe. Pls pay attention to the facts and not comments made by the uneducated on this topic.https://twitter.com/realdonaldtrump/status/946531657229701120 …

946859287611101184.text: The earth’s climate and temps have naturally fluctuated between ice ages and warm periods since its beginning. It is illogical to claim that the earth’s temperatures aren’t rising right now. The ISSUE is our effect on it this time around and how dramatically we’ve increased it.

946859800645783553.text: 16 of the 17 hottest years on RECORD have occurred since 2001. Let that sink in. The rate of global ice loss has more than doubled since 1996 and is continuing to increase. About 36-60 cubic miles of ice was lost in Greenland & similar in Antarctica in just a 4 year time span.

946860185452273664.text: The rate of global sea level rise in the last 2 decades is double that of the last century. This has serious effects on people and coastal habitats. Ocean acidification has increased by 30% since the industrial revolution.

946860752303992832.text: All of this is caused by the increase of greenhouse gases. Evidence of the levels of CO2 in every year, dating thousands of years back, are found in air bubbles trapped inside of ice cores drawn in Greenland & Antarctica. Similar evidence is found in coral reefs & tree rings.

946861791073665024.text: All of that data is shown in this graph, an approved of set of data recognized by the majority of the scientific community. Notice the natural rise and fall, yet the current level of CO2 is dramatically higher than any past period we have on record. Humans aren’t to blame? Hmmpic.twitter.com/di0t4Hy5MC

946862241101557760.text: While you’re here, remember that we can slow down this process. Each of your actions seriously matters. Make others aware. Don’t waste water. Be energy efficient. Drive less. Reduce your carbon footprint. You guys know this stuff. Quit ignoring it.
